name: Baked Vegan Jalapeno Poppers for Superbowl. Vegan Recipe
description: These Baked Vegan Jalapeno poppers are filled with my cheesy Jalapeno popper dip. Rolled up in breadcrumbs and baked to perfection.
recipeIngredient: 6  Jalapenos - slit and seeds and pith removed
My Jalapeno Havarti Popper dip (or just the cream cheese Jalapeno dip or use other vegan cream cheese.)
1/2 cup almond milk  (or other non dairy milk)
2 Tablespoon flour (wheat, unbleached white or spelt or other gf flour)

recipeInstructions.text: Prep the Jalapenos. (Use gloves if you are not sure about the spiciness. The seeds and pith can sometimes give a really bad spice burn). Remove the pith and seeds as much as possible.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep the Jalapenos. (Use gloves if you are not sure about the spiciness. The seeds and pith can sometimes give a really bad spice burn). Remove the pith and seeds as much as possible.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill the jalapenos up with chilled cream cheese popper dip. (the chilled dip is quite thick).
recipeInstructions.name: Fill the jalapenos up with chilled cream cheese popper dip. (the chilled dip is quite thick).

recipeInstructions.text: Set up the breading area. Mix the milk with the spices, flaxmeal and flour in a deep down and keep ready.
recipeInstructions.name: Set up the breading area. Mix the milk with the spices, flaxmeal and flour in a deep down and keep ready.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix up the bread crumbs with paprika and salt and optionally add a tsp of oil and mix them up.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix up the bread crumbs with paprika and salt and optionally add a tsp of oil and mix them up.

recipeInstructions.text: Dip Jalapenos with filled side up into the milk mixture (do not roll, just submerge them and lift out). Then immediately dip into the breadcrumb mixture. Use a spoon to sprinkle some extra breadcrumbs on top and press. Place the pepper on parchment lined sheet. Bake in preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 25 minutes or until golden to your preference.
recipeInstructions.name: Dip Jalapenos with filled side up into the milk mixture (do not roll, just submerge them and lift out). Then immediately dip into the breadcrumb mixture. Use a spoon to sprinkle some extra breadcrumbs on top and press. Place the pepper on parchment lined sheet. Bake in preheated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 25 minutes or until golden to your preference.
